title: How To Find the Best Categories and Keywords for Your Book on Amazon with Publisher Rocket
description:
Keywords and Categories can make or break your book's performance on Amazon. This webinar digs deep into how you can find the best performing keywords and categories for your book. You can do it manually, or you can get some help with the amazing tool, Publisher Rocket. Get it at https://writepublishsell.com/rocket

Presented by Hank Marcacci of Publisher Rocket
tags: book marketing strategies and tips for authors
